text:
Political parties have been asked to inform officials if they come across multiple entries and names of deceased persons in the electoral roll.

On Monday, representatives of several political parties attended an all party meeting convened by Collector R. Nanthagopal.

An official said the political party representatives have been asked to bring to notice of the district administration or electoral registration officers details of multiple entries, names of deceased persons and doubtful entries in the voter’s list.

It is said that they can give the details in written, following which the officers will undertake appropriate inquiry.
title: All-party meet held
